result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Van C. Price

records.addlTxt:
10:18 AM Prosecuting attorney Alex Huber in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Van C. Price in court.  Attorney Michael Robert Barth in court for Van C. Price. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Victim rights compliance. Attorney Barth states that he now has discovery and is requesting a trial date. Ludwig hearing to be held at jury status hearing.
Jury status hearing scheduled for February 1, 2023 at 01:30 pm.
Jury selection scheduled for February 6, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Defendant, Van C. Price, appeared with Attorney Michael Robert Barth.  Attorney Brendaliz Valdes appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Case bound over.   Information filed, reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

01:43 PM    Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in person in court w/ Attorney Michael Barth.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Bond continued as previously set. (see previous bond entry). rb
Adjourned initial appearance on June 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

02:48 PM  Attorney Zachary Brost appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm (atty status).  Bond continued w/same conditions.  SPD has not appointed counsel for Deft.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing.  kmk
SPD has not yet secured representation.  kmk
Status conference on April 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant, Van C. Price, appeared.  Attorney Emily K. Gaertner appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
SPD has not yet secured representation.  kmk
Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation.  kmk
